table.name: vtiger_mortgage
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mortgage` ( `mortgageid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `policynumber` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedclient` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `company` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `monthly` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `total` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mortgagecf
